content.label: I, like a few others, bought this game before it was free to play. Now the game tries to steer you towards paying for microtansactions to be able to beat some courses. It can be frustrating when it seems the game is intentionally giving you bad cards forcing you to pay to unlock more courses. The game itself is fantastic. I just wish they didn’t make this free to play.
Yeah yeah singing challenge go
Stopped playing for about 6 months because the Club Booster RARELY gave extra chips for leftover cards even though the timer was clearly running. Here I am 6 months later and it STILL doesn't work.
I’ve loved this game but now not playing as much with the ads to get other games. ☹️

I really like the game. My only complaint is that when you get to your last draw card the pile has been replaced with a +5 pile that costs coins. I keep accidentally “buying” more cards. There should at least be an undo or secondary question to make sure you want to actually buy.
Greatest ever
Great game

I love the game, but they are making it harder and harder to win without spending money. I know they want to make money, but they also have ads and I’m sure they are making plenty of money there. Personally, while I refuse to spend money during the game, I have purchased a number of products that I saw on their ads. If they continue to make more and more games impossible to win, I will delete the game. 

Today was the worst!!! All three games were basically impossible to win, even if I had 5000 chips. And, I know what I’m talking about, I invented computer card solitaire. These idiots better get their act straight or more and more players will discover that this game is ripping them off.
I love this game I'm sometimes very good at it I like to play fast and sometimes the ads are too long in a Rupps my thought process I don't like the ads I'd rather pay a dollar a month then watch ads
nice game

I’ve been playing this game for an embarrassing amount of time, maybe about 5 years. I’m sort of convinced I’m the only person who still plays but I will continue to do so as long as it’s in the App Store. Basically, I felt bad playing everyday and not leaving a review. Thanks for a great app!
Good game. The ads don’t give you credit every time.
Very challenging game fun & fast moving

title.label: No more Christmas in July please!!!

content.label: Wonderful game but horrible idea!!!
So addictive!
I bought this game years ago, and it’s always the first game I open every morning to play.  Loads of fun!

title.label: Too hard to complete w/o paying

content.label: I use to love this game but as of late it’s like I can’t even win without spending money which I refuse to do. I think one game I got through half a deck of cards before having a plausible match... seems virtually impossible to complete them as perfect. Feels more like luck when I do get perfect scores tbh.
This app is so fun and so cute and hilarious the graphics are so great and it’s so addictive and relaxing I hope they make for fairway solitary with tomy Mars and jack hogan
Used to love this game, but as others have mentioned it’s gotten ridiculous. The ads I started receiving were the last step. Thanks for the old times.

The game could be great fun, were it not for the need to shell out money hand over fist. If you don’t want to spend $$ every time you turn around, be prepared for some dull gameplay, hardly ever clearing a round. The very design of this app is to get you spending money as frequently as possible. No thanks. Never did like the pay-to-play nonsense to begin with, but this app has to be among the worst offenders.

I have played this game for years. Never had ads unless I wanted to earn extra stamps or gold bucks. All of a sudden this week I am getting ads for games . Dislike. Other than that this is a fun game and I love it.

This game is addicting and challenges you at every level, a bit expensive for golf bucks to continue your card run, but a great way to destress.
J.J. Babee F.

title.label: No fun any more, as prizes have shrunk.

content.label: I have been playing this for years and have >3mil golf balls on hand, but for the last several months it is usually 12 challenge cups or shuffles as prizes on “exquisite game” where as 10 gold clubs or 10,000 golf balls used to be the normal.
The game used to be better and now they’ve added ads to the game. I rarely play this anymore due to those reasons.
Constant challenge moves quickly with many rewards
Great

There are so many twists and turns in the solitaire games, they are so much fun  and truly keep your brain active.  There are lots of rewards and such a variety that I look forward to playing daily.  The Internet is full of solitaire games, but I can guarantee they are nothing like Fairway offers, the challenges are amazing.  Play once and you will be hooked!  Once you learn the unique games, join a Country Club.  That will create new challenges and is a great way to earn even more  tokens and other tools to make winning easier.
It’s impossible to move up in this game.  Program to make you spend money.  Shame on you doing this time when money is so hard to come by.  Deleted.
I was having a technical issue, but I was able to fix the problem. I mean with one iPad.

title.label: Free offers caused 6 adware threats to PC

content.label: Beware of offers for free golf bucks.  Applying for free McDonald’s Gift cards caused malware to be immediately blocked by my antivirus program.  Now I’m getting flooded with email spam.  Don’t open anything! The video ads for free golf bucks are no longer offered .  Game has become a scam loaded with adware, spyware and malware.  Delete this game.  I did and will never play it again.
Like most games now a days, this game has become a total cash grab. I played for years and loved it, now the only way to advance is to pay for extras.

title.label: Enjoy the game/dislike that it freezes

content.label: I’ve enjoyed playing this game for years, but it freezes about once a month. Sometimes I can restore my data after deleting it, but sometimes it will not allow me to sign in to my Big Fish account again. It is so frustrating I am GIVING UP on this company!!!!!
You rip people off .
With the latest version, there are connection issues that mean my current status is not downloaded , and the app just keeps starting over from the beginning holes.

I am changing my glowing review, which I placed about six years ago.  Since then, the game has new, greedy owners.  Before they took over, I had over 7,000,000 coins —- and never spent a penny.  I now have two million something.  If you like to waste money, and play solitaire when you usually spend more chips than you acquire, this game is for you.
There is no chance of winning the game without using power ups which cost money.
Now in order to win you have to spend. It’s not worth playing
I did more than one of the offers to get free golf bucks.. Now I’m getting a TON of spam emails. And didn’t get rewarded after pop up after pop up. Absolute bull.

I love this game, but some of the daily games have gotten so hard that it is close to not being fun to play.  And the games with 6 and 9 holes are super hard too.

 I absolutely love the commentary, and the things they say still make me laugh!  I love that this game is not just for kids, it’s for adults too.

Please fix how hard this game is to play on the higher levels.
This game was really fun initially.  It has changed over time and not in a good way.

name.label: K.M.A if you get my drift

title.label: Post this if you are honest!  Dammit!

content.label: Your game SUCKSZ ASSZ because you don’t give enough to get paid for your work as developers, you are supposed to grant more advantages then disadvantages, because in doing so, you’d have more loyal payers, you silly wabbit!!!  Trix is for kids😜
This event is a colossal waste of time. The rewards are a joke.  Who thought this was a good idea?  This is the only game I play and I am seriously thinking of deleting it.

title.label: Obnoxious loud ads ignoring sound settings in game

content.label: I like most of the elements of this game. Besides crashing quite a bit after game completion, the ever increasing, long ads are frequently blasting music at maximum decibels even if you have in game sound set to zero. Jarring at a minimum but the music doesn’t add any value to the ads. I’m not opposed to ads—but these violate common sense. in addition these ads will force you to the App Store even if (and especially for some) when you click the X to close it. I’m guessing that’s a way for the developers to gain revenue but it cheats advertisers.
Fair way is the best
What happened to the daily challenge?

The game is fun but as it progresses you cannot advance unless you purchase enhancements to help you score. It doesn’t matter how clever you are or how well you play you have to have them. I finally got tired of constantly buying clubs and power-ups that I deleted it.

title.label: The game keeps resetting my progress!

content.label: I will get to a fairly decent level that it took me a while to get to, and when I log in the next day, it’ll either still be there or make me restart and do the tutorial again. The Facebook login doesn’t work and won’t let me log in that way. I’ve already restarted several times and am just over it at this point. I will play again once they fix this as it’s very frustrating!

To all the haters of this game-then don’t play it.!!   This game is the BEST!!  The developers are not money hungry. Use your brain. U can play this without having to buy anything.  This is the best game and I’ve been playing this for 5 years!! And I haven’t been able to purchase anything cause I’m on a fixed income and I can’t purchase anything and not be out of my home. Anyway, a big thank you for the developers. U do wonderful work. Please keep up the wonderful work.!!!

Ads are now popping up once you finish a course. They can be dismissed after a short time but if you do, then you’ll have to wait another ten seconds watching an ad to install the game...THAT YOU JUST SKIPPED THE AD FOR!

(Tell us how you really feel, am I right?)

I’ve been playing for several years now, but the new devs are getting ultra greedy. Next update will probably have both an ad free version (that will probably be a monthly subscription that you will barely get anything for - bonus powerup wise) or you’ll have to endure ads for the max length of time with no ad skips available. (Unless they make a new powerup to skip ads - that you’ll have to pay for of course!)

This review was submitted on 5/22/20 so if they went back to original play style with no ads, good on them. I’m not playing anymore so this 1 start will remain because of their greediness regardless of what they choose to do.

Thanks for the fun!
The chance to earn the club card rewards are strange. I have for a few times now had the game start in the middle and then it is impossible to win it. Why?
